name: Togglegroup
author: Leon Zhang
description: Togglegroups are used to display a set of clickable option buttons, which can be either independently or mutual-exclusively toggled.

documentation.description: Togglegroups are used to display a set of clickable option buttons, which can be either independently or mutual-exclusively toggled.

attributes.name: Indicates the name to use for the group of buttons. This is the default keyname that will be submitted if submitted through a form.
attributes.group: Indicates the name of the the button's grouping.

getters.options: Returns an array of the option button DOM elements in this togglegroup
